'''Honey Char Siu''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Honey Char Siu can be purchased from [[Chef Mao]] for {{Item|Mora|x=1,125}}.

Depending on the quality, Honey Char Siu restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''210'''/'''260'''/'''300''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Gaming|Yummy Yum Cha}}
